label: LogisticsStatus
comment: The information relevant to a condition or a position related to logistics.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
The code specifying this logistics status condition [UNECE Recommendation 24].
A code specifying a reason for this logistics status [UNECE Recommendation 24].
A reason, expressed as text, for this cancellation status.
The reference date or date time for this referenced document.
A sequence number for these specified personal effects.

objectProperties.comment: A transport arrival event reported for this logistics status.
A transport departure event reported for this logistics status.
A transport loading event reported for this logistics status.
A supply chain event reported for this logistics status.
A location specified for this logistics status.
A transport unloading event reported for this logistics status.
A period of validity specified for this referenced document.

referencedBy.comment: A logistics status reported for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
A status specified for this logistics transport movement.
A logistics status reported for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
A logistics status reported for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
A status specified for this logistics transport movement.
